patthana21.42:4.1: Nasappaṭighaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.42:5.1: Naappaṭighaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.42:6.1: Nasappaṭighaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca naappaṭighaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.42:6.4: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.42:7.1: Nasappaṭighaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.42:7.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana21.42:8.1: Naappaṭighaṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.42:8.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
